name: buyesi-frontend
description: This is the frontend for the Buyesi Youth Initiative website. The frontend has been integrated with the backend API to display dynamic content.

scripts.minify:js: uglifyjs js/main.js -o js/main.min.js; uglifyjs js/api.js -o js/api.min.js; uglifyjs js/home.js -o js/home.min.js; uglifyjs js/footer.js -o js/footer.min.js
scripts.build: npm run minify:js; npm run minify:css
